data.title: Contact Us
data.meta_description: Florida Department of Education Office of the Commissioner Turlington Building, Suite 1514 325 West Gaines Street Tallahassee, Florida 32399 Email: Commission.
data.text:
Office of the Commissioner

For questions & comments regarding human resources policies, programs and service, please contact the Bureau of Personnel Management.

For questions or concerns regarding public universities, please contact the Board of Governors

For questions or concerns regarding educator certification, please contact the Bureau of Educator Certification.

For questions or concerns regarding the Department of Education website, please contact the Web Master.

For all other questions and concerns, please email Commissioner@fldoe.org.
